markdownRemark.excerpt: Though Typhoon Pepeng(Pharma) spared Metro Manila, it ’ s still wreaking havoc to thousands of our countrymen up North. Let ’ s pray for them and if we can…
markdownRemark.html:
Though Typhoon Pepeng(Pharma) spared Metro Manila, it’s still wreaking havoc to thousands of our countrymen up North. Let’s pray for them and if we can, help in getting the information to government units (Like the NDCC, PNC etc.). Using the latest twitter search widget and Google Ajax Feeds, I’m setting up this page as an outpost to get updates on Typhoon Pepeng. Use it as you see fit.

Reminder: If the feeds don’t show, you might need to enable Javascript.
Bookmark this page for the latest news on Bagyong Pepeng.

Together let’s be vigilant!

Loading …
